definitions.definition: A government in which a single ruler (a tyrant ) has absolute power , or this system of government; especially, one that acts cruelly and unjustly.
The office or jurisdiction of an absolute ruler .
A system of government in which power is exercised on behalf of the ruler or ruling class, without regard to the wishes of the governed.

main_definition: A government in which a single ruler (a tyrant ) has absolute power , or this system of government; especially, one that acts cruelly and unjustly.
